Package se.lth.cs.etsa02.basicmeleebot

Class PositioningSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.lth.cs.etsa02.basicmeleebot.PositioningSystem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MockPositioningSystem
    public class PositioningSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    A class providing support for calculating positions related to the battle field.

        public PositioningSystem​(double width,

    • Method Detail

      • checkCloseToWall

        public PositioningSystem.Wall checkCloseToWall​(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double point,
                                               double nearWallDistance)
        Check whether a certain point is close to one of the walls. If so returns that wall.
        Parameters:
        point - the point to check.
        nearWallDistance - the distance from the wall.
        Returns:
        if the distance from the point to one of the walls is less than nearWallDistance, return that wall. Otherwise, return null.

      • getProjectionOnWall

        public java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double getProjectionOnWall​(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double point,
                                                        PositioningSystem.Wall wall)
        Compute the projection of a point on a wall.
        Parameters:
        point - the point to compute.
        wall - the wall to compute.
        Returns:
        the projection of the point on the wall.
